info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:17PM MDT until June 07 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA AND NORTHEASTERN CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 1017 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Wild Horse Point, or 34 miles north of La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arlington and Blue Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
